00045 inline int roundInt (double v)
00046 {
00047         return (int)(v+0.5);
00048 }
00049 
00050 inline int float_compare( const void *vf1, const void *vf2)
00051 {
00052         float *f1 = (float *)vf1;
00053         float *f2 = (float *)vf2;
00054 
00055         if (*f1 < *f2)
00056                 return -1;
00057 
00058         if (*f1 > *f2)
00059                 return 1;
00060 
00061         return 0;
00062 }
00063 
00064 inline float PercentileValue (const float *values, const int numValues, const float percentile, float *range=0)
00065 {
00066         unsigned long valueBefore,valueAfter;
00067         float percentileIndex,fraction;
00068 
00069         percentileIndex=((float)numValues-1.0F)* percentile;
00070         valueBefore =(unsigned long)percentileIndex;
00071         valueAfter = valueBefore + 1;
00072 
00073         // Bounds check on indices
00074         valueAfter=min(valueAfter,(unsigned long)(numValues-1));
00075         valueBefore=max(valueBefore,(unsigned long)0);
00076 
00077         fraction = percentileIndex - valueBefore;
00078 
00079         float return_value = values[valueBefore] + fraction * (values[valueAfter] - values[valueBefore]);
00080 
00081         if (range)
00082                 *range = values[valueAfter] - values[valueBefore];
00083 
00084         return return_value;
00085 }

00088 
00089 bool examine_intensities (const float *intensities, int ncols, int nrows, double pct_low, double pct_high, double floor, double ceiling, double &v_pct_low, double &v_pct_high, char *emsg, int emsg_alloc_sz)
00090 {
00091         int N = ncols*nrows;
00092 
00093         float *tmp = new float[N];
00094         memmove (tmp,intensities,N*sizeof(float));
00095 
00096         qsort ((void*)tmp,N,sizeof(float),float_compare);
00097 
00098         v_pct_low = PercentileValue (tmp,N,(float)pct_low);
00099         v_pct_high = PercentileValue (tmp,N,(float)pct_high);
00100 
00101         delete [] tmp;
00102 
00103         return true;
00104 }
00105 
00106 inline double compute_linear_intensity (double p, double vlow, double v, double target_intensity_low)
00107 {
00108         double linear_v = pow (p,(v-vlow)) * target_intensity_low;
00109         return linear_v;
00110 }
00111 
00112 double compute_power_for_this_range (double target_range, double vlow, double vhigh, double target_intensity_low)
00113 {
00114         // Start searching at 2.0
00115         double p = 2.0;
00116 
00117         double e1 = target_range - compute_linear_intensity (p-.0005, vlow, vhigh, target_intensity_low);
00118         double e2 = target_range - compute_linear_intensity (p+.0005, vlow, vhigh, target_intensity_low);
00119 
00120         double e = (e2+e1)/2.0;
00121 
00122         double dpde = 0.001 / (e2-e1);
00123 
00124         int iter = 0;
00125 
00126         while (fabs (e) > 0.1)
00127         {
00128                 iter++;
00129 
00130                 p += -e*dpde;
00131 
00132                 e1 = target_range - compute_linear_intensity (p-.0005, vlow, vhigh, target_intensity_low);
00133                 e2 = target_range - compute_linear_intensity (p+.0005, vlow, vhigh, target_intensity_low);
00134 
00135                 dpde = 0.001 / (e2-e1);
00136 
00137                 e = (e2+e1)/2.0;
00138         }
00139 
00140         return p;
00141 }
00142 
00143 
00144 double compute_percentile_fast(const float *v, int N, double pct, int approx_to_use)
00145 {
00146         int n = N;
00147         int step = 1;
00148         if (N/approx_to_use >= 2)
00149         {
00150                 step = N / approx_to_use;
00151 
00152                 n = N / step;
00153         }
00154 
00155         float *tmp = new float[n+1];
00156         int j = 0;
00157         for (int i = 0; i < N; i += step)
00158         {
00159                 tmp[j++] = v[i];
00160 
00161                 if (j == n)
00162                         break;
00163         }
00164         n = j;
00165 
00166         qsort(tmp, n, sizeof(float), float_compare);
00167 
00168         double v_pct = (double)PercentileValue (tmp,n,(float)pct);
00169         delete[] tmp;
00170 
00171         return v_pct;
00172 }
00173 
00174 inline double compute_slope(double v, double p, double vlow, double target_intensity_low)
00175 {
00176         double delta = 0.001;
00177 
00178         double v0 = compute_linear_intensity(p, vlow, v - delta, target_intensity_low);
00179         double v1 = compute_linear_intensity(p, vlow, v + delta, target_intensity_low);
00180 
00181         double slope = (v1 - v0) / (exp(v + delta) - exp(v - delta));
00182 
00183         return slope;
00184 }
00185 
00186 bool compute_line_at_transition_point(double p, double vlow, double target_intensity_low, double v_transition, double &slope_after_transition, double &intercept_after_transtion)
00187 {
00188         double slope = compute_slope(v_transition, p, vlow, target_intensity_low);
00189 
00190         slope_after_transition = slope;
00191 
00192         double x = exp (v_transition);
00193         double y = compute_linear_intensity(p, vlow, v_transition, target_intensity_low);
00194 
00195         intercept_after_transtion = y - slope*x;
00196 
00197         return true;
00198 }
00199 
00200 bool update_intensities (double target_intensity_low, double target_intensity_high, double vlow, double vhigh, double gain_lock_pct, float *intensity_array, int ncols, int nrows, double ceiling, double floor, int &nfloor, int &nceil, char *emsg, int emsg_alloc_sz, const char *histogram_file/*=0*/)
00201 {
00202         // Find the appropriate power to use for scaling
00203         double target_range = target_intensity_high-target_intensity_low;
00204         double p = compute_power_for_this_range (target_range,vlow,vhigh,target_intensity_low);
00205 
00206         double _vmax=-1e20,_vmin=1e20;
00207 
00208         nfloor = 0;
00209         nceil = 0;
00210 
00211         int N = ncols*nrows;
00212         
00213         double v0_re_norm = 0, v1_re_norm = 0;
00214         double v_transition = 0;
00215         double slope_after_transition=0;
00216         double intercept_after_transition = 0;
00217 
00218         bool btransition_computed_successfully = false;
00219 
00220         //double gain_lock_pct = 0.9;
00221         double re_norm_pct = 0.0;
00222 
00223         if (re_norm_pct)
00224         {
00225                 v0_re_norm = compute_percentile_fast(intensity_array, N, re_norm_pct, 100000);
00226                 v0_re_norm = pow(2, v0_re_norm);
00227         }
00228         
00229         if (gain_lock_pct)
00230         {
00231                 v_transition = compute_percentile_fast(intensity_array, N, gain_lock_pct, 100000);
00232                 btransition_computed_successfully = compute_line_at_transition_point(p, vlow, target_intensity_low, v_transition, slope_after_transition, intercept_after_transition);
00233         }
00234 
00235         for (int idx=0; idx<N; idx++)
00236         {
00237                 double v = intensity_array[idx];
00238 
00239                 double linear_v;
00240 
00241                 if (btransition_computed_successfully && v >= v_transition)
00242                         linear_v = exp(v)*slope_after_transition + intercept_after_transition;
00243                 else
00244                         linear_v = compute_linear_intensity (p, vlow, v, target_intensity_low);
00245 
00246                 intensity_array[idx] = (float)linear_v;
00247                 if (intensity_array[idx] < floor)
00248                 {
00249                         intensity_array[idx] = (float)floor;
00250                         nfloor++;
00251                 }
00252                 else
00253                 if (intensity_array[idx] > ceiling)
00254                 {
00255                         intensity_array[idx] = (float)ceiling;
00256                         nceil++;
00257                 }
00258 
00259                 _vmax = max (linear_v,_vmax);
00260                 _vmin = min (linear_v,_vmin);
00261         }
00262 
00263         // Do intensity re-normalization
00264         if (re_norm_pct)
00265         {
00266                 _vmax = -1e20;
00267                 _vmin = +1e20;
00268                 nfloor = 0;
00269                 nceil = 0;
00270 
00271                 v1_re_norm = compute_percentile_fast(intensity_array, N, re_norm_pct, 100000);
00272 
00273                 double sf = v0_re_norm / v1_re_norm;
00274 
00275                 for (int idx = 0; idx < N; idx++)
00276                 {
00277                         double linear_v = intensity_array[idx];
00278                         linear_v *= sf;
00279 
00280                         intensity_array[idx] = (float)linear_v;
00281                         if (intensity_array[idx] < floor)
00282                         {
00283                                 intensity_array[idx] = (float)floor;
00284                                 nfloor++;
00285                         }
00286                         else
00287                         if (intensity_array[idx] > ceiling)
00288                         {
00289                                 intensity_array[idx] = (float)ceiling;
00290                                 nceil++;
00291                         }
00292 
00293                         _vmax = max(linear_v, _vmax);
00294                         _vmin = min(linear_v, _vmin);
00295                 }
00296         }
00297 
00298         if (histogram_file)
00299         {
00300                 int N = ncols*nrows;
00301                 double log_factor = 1.0/log10(p);
00302 
00303                 double vmin = log_factor*log10(_vmin);
00304                 double vmax = log_factor*log10(_vmax);
00305                 double range = vmax-vmin;
00306                 const int nbins=200;
00307                 int bins[nbins];
00308                 memset (bins,0,sizeof(bins));
00309 
00310                 for (int i=0; i<N; i++)
00311                 {
00312                         int ibin = roundInt (nbins * ((log_factor*log10(intensity_array[i]) - vmin) / range));
00313                         if (ibin < 0) 
00314                                 ibin = 0;
00315                         if (ibin >= nbins)
00316                                 ibin = nbins-1;
00317 
00318                         bins[ibin]++;
00319                 }
00320 
00321                 FILE *stream = 0;               
00322                 stream = fopen (histogram_file,"w");
00323                 if (stream)
00324                 {
00325                         fprintf (stream,"p=%lf\n",p);
00326                         fprintf (stream,"log_p(v)(CEL)\tcount\n");
00327 
00328                         for (int ibin=0; ibin<nbins; ibin++)
00329                         {
00330                                 fprintf (stream,"%lf\t%ld\n",range*((double)ibin/(double)nbins) + vmin,(long)bins[ibin]);
00331                         }
00332                         fclose (stream);
00333                 }
00334         }
00335 
00336         return true;
00337 }
00338 
00339 bool convert_to_log_scale (float *intensities, int ncols, int nrows, char *emsg, int emsg_alloc_sz)
00340 {
00341         int N = ncols*nrows;
00342         for (int i=0; i<N; i++)
00343         {
00344                 double v = intensities[i];
00345                 if (v < 1.0e-20)
00346                 {
00347             // @todo: rewrite with std::string
00348                         sprintf (emsg,"convert_to_log_scale () invalid intensity %f at index=%ld",v,(long)i);
00349                         return false;
00350                 }
00351 
00352                 v = log (v);
00353 
00354                 intensities[i] = (float)v;
00355         }
00356 
00357         return true;
00358 }

00360 
00361 bool ReScaleIntensities 
00362 (
00363         float *intensity_array, 
00364         int ncols, 
00365         int nrows,
00366         
00367         double pct_low,
00368         double pct_high,
00369         
00370         double target_intensity_low,
00371         double target_intensity_high,
00372         
00373         double floor,
00374         double ceiling,
00375 
00376         int &nfloor,
00377         int &nceil,
00378 
00379         double gain_lock_pct,
00380 
00381         char *emsg,
00382         int emsg_alloc_sz,
00383         
00384         const char *histogram_file/*=0*/
00385 )
00386 {
00387         bool status = convert_to_log_scale (intensity_array, ncols, nrows, emsg, emsg_alloc_sz);
00388         if (status == false)
00389                 return false;
00390 
00391         double v_pct_low;
00392         double v_pct_high;
00393 
00394         status = examine_intensities (intensity_array, ncols, nrows, pct_low, pct_high, floor, ceiling, v_pct_low, v_pct_high, emsg, emsg_alloc_sz);
00395 
00396         if (status == false)
00397                 return false;
00398 
00399         status = update_intensities (target_intensity_low, target_intensity_high, v_pct_low, v_pct_high, gain_lock_pct, intensity_array, ncols, nrows, ceiling, floor, nfloor, nceil, emsg, emsg_alloc_sz, histogram_file);
00400         if (status == false)
00401                 return false;
00402 
00403         return true;
00404 }

00406 FILE *ScaleIntensities::create_cel_file (int chipIx)
00407 {
00408         const std::string cel_file_name = m_TransformedIMart->getCelFileNames()[chipIx];
00409         
00410         char file[2048];
00411         memset (file,0,sizeof(file));
00412 
00413         if (1)
00414         {
00415                 if (cel_file_name.length ()+8 < sizeof(file))
00416                 {
00417                         const char *c = cel_file_name.c_str ();
00418                         int i=0;
00419                         for (i=0; i<cel_file_name.length (); i++)
00420                         {
00421                                 file[i] = c[i];
00422                         }
00423 
00424                         strcat (file,".Scaled.txt");
00425                 }
00426         }
00427         else
00428                 sprintf (file,"c:\\Users\\Public\\%ld.txt",(long)chipIx);
00429 
00430         FILE *stream = fopen (file,"w");
00431         if (stream)
00432         {
00433                 fprintf (stream,"Idx\tIntensity\n");
00434         }
00435 
00436         return stream;
00437 }

00439 float *get_float_array (std::vector<float>& v)
00440 {
00441         float *a = new float[v.size ()];
00442         for (int i=0; i<v.size (); i++)
00443                 a[i] = v[i];
00444         return a;
00445 }

00447 void ScaleIntensities::transform(int chipIx, std::vector<float>& intensity_vector) 
00448 {
00449         double pct_low = m_low_pct; // 0.02;
00450         double pct_high = m_high_pct; // 0.98;
00451         double target_intensity_low = m_low; //20.0;
00452         double target_intensity_high = m_high; //50000.0;
00453         double floor = m_floor; // 3.0;
00454         double ceiling = m_ceiling; // 1000000.0;
00455         double gain_lock_pct = m_gain_lock_pct;
00456 
00457         const char *histogram_file = 0;
00458 
00459         int nfloor = 0;
00460         int nceil = 0;
00461 
00462         char emsg[2048];
00463 
00464         float *intensity_array = get_float_array (intensity_vector); 
00465         ReScaleIntensities 
00466         (
00467                 intensity_array, 
00468                 intensity_vector.size (), 
00469                 1,
00470         
00471                 pct_low,
00472                 pct_high,
00473         
00474                 target_intensity_low,
00475                 target_intensity_high,
00476         
00477                 floor,
00478                 ceiling,
00479 
00480                 nfloor,
00481                 nceil,
00482 
00483                 gain_lock_pct,
00484 
00485                 emsg,
00486                 sizeof(emsg),
00487         
00488                 histogram_file
00489         );
00490 
00491         for (uint32_t probeIx = 0; probeIx < intensity_vector.size(); probeIx++) 
00492         {
00493                 if (is_filtered_probe (probeIx))
00494                         continue;
00495                 intensity_vector[probeIx] = intensity_array[probeIx];
00496         }
00497 
00498         while (m_cel_out)
00499         {
00500                 char cel_file_name_SI[2048];
00501                 memset (cel_file_name_SI,0,sizeof(cel_file_name_SI));           
00502                 
00503                 const std::string cel_file_name = m_TransformedIMart->getCelFileNames()[chipIx];
00504 
00505                 if (cel_file_name.length ()+8 > sizeof(cel_file_name_SI))
00506                         break;
00507 
00508                 const char *c = cel_file_name.c_str ();
00509                 int i=0;
00510                 for (i=0; i<cel_file_name.length (); i++)
00511                         cel_file_name_SI[i] = c[i];
00512 
00513                 int len = strlen (cel_file_name_SI);
00514                 if (cel_file_name_SI[len-4] == '.')
00515                         cel_file_name_SI[len-4] = 0;
00516 
00517                 strcat (cel_file_name_SI,".SI.cel");
00518 
00519                 if (copy_file (cel_file_name.c_str (),cel_file_name_SI) == false)
00520                         break;
00521 
00522                 char err_msg[1024];
00523                 if (Fusion_UpdateCelFileIntensityValues (cel_file_name_SI,"Default Group",intensity_vector,intensity_vector.size (),err_msg,sizeof(err_msg)) == 0)
00524                         unlink (cel_file_name_SI);
00525 
00526                 break;
00527         }
00528 }

00531 
00532 void ScaleIntensities::newDataSet(IntensityMart* iMart) 
00533 {
00534         int dataSetCount = iMart->getCelDataSetCount();
00535 
00536         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "Applying ScaleIntensities to " + ToStr(dataSetCount) + " cel datasets", dataSetCount, 0, dataSetCount);
00537 
00538         m_TransformedIMart = iMart;
00539         // if there aren't any chipstream nodes after this, then don't store
00540         // all of the intensities
00541         if (m_Streams.empty()) 
00542         {
00543                 m_TransformedIMart->setStoreAllCelIntensities(false);
00544         }
00545 
00546         std::vector<float> data;
00547         for (int d = 0; d < dataSetCount; d++) 
00548         {
00549                 Verbose::progressStep(1);
00550                 data = iMart->getCelData(d);
00551                 transform(d, data);
00552                 m_TransformedIMart->setProbeIntensity(d, data);
00553         }
00554         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done.");
00555 
00556         chipStreamPassNewChip(m_TransformedIMart);
00557 }
00558 
00559 bool ScaleIntensities::is_filtered_probe (int iprobe)
00560 {
00561         if (m_ChipLayout_obj == 0)
00562                 return false;
00563 
00564         if (iprobe < 0)
00565                 return false;
00566         
00567         if (m_ChipLayout_obj->getQCProbeMap ().size () <= iprobe)
00568                 return false;
00569 
00570         if (m_ChipLayout_obj->getQCProbeMap ()[iprobe])
00571                 return true;
00572 
00573         return false;
00574 }
